socialMedia.name: Development and Content
socialMedia.description: Now, we bring your vision to life. Through coding, testing, and more coding, we ensure a smooth, seamless launch, always keeping you in the loop. This stage also involves gathering all necessary copy, content, and imagery from you to perfectly encapsulate your brand.

socialMedia.name: Go Live
socialMedia.description: It's the big day! We launch your site into the digital world. But it’s more than just hitting the 'live' button; we ensure your site is polished, optimized, and ready to wow your audience from the outset. Consider this your digital grand opening.

socialMedia.name: Keep It Rolling
socialMedia.description: Our journey doesn’t end at launch. We stick around for a week to ensure everything runs smoothly. Beyond that, we offer retainer services for additional tweaks, updates, or new content, available on an ad hoc basis or through 6-12 month packages, ensuring your site remains fresh and relevant.

steps.name: Let's Get Talking
steps.description: Everything starts with a chat. Tell us about your business and what you're dreaming of online. We'll sketch out a no-fuss plan to make it happen, clear and simple, no tech babble.

steps.name: Your Custom Plan
steps.description: With the insights from our chat, we'll craft a plan that fits just right. You'll see exactly what we can do for you, with clear costs and no surprises. Once you're happy, we're ready to roll.

steps.name: Mapping It Out
steps.description: Now, we dig into the details, planning out your site or brand refresh. We're talking designs, features, and the tech stuff—explained in plain English—so it's all shaping up just as you pictured.

steps.name: Bringing It to Life
steps.description: This is where the magic happens. We get cracking on the build, keeping you in the loop with updates. Need content or images? We've got that covered too, just send them our way.

steps.name: Launch Time
steps.description: Here's the big moment! We go live, making sure everything's shiny, running smoothly, and ready to wow. It's not just flipping a switch; it's about making sure your site makes a splash from day one.

steps.name: We've Got Your Back
steps.description: Even after your site goes live, we're here to help it keep ticking perfectly. Need a tweak or update? Just give us a shout. Plus, we've got ongoing support packages if you're looking for the extra peace of mind.
